bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Crashes in some machines with assertion failed at AudioMixerSourceManager
bug.description:
We're getting crashes in specific machines after upgrading the project to UE4.22. <denchmark-code> LogCore: === Critical error: === Unhandled Exception: SIGSEGV: invalid attempt to read memory at address 0x0000000000007ef2
LogCore: Assertion failed: CommandBuffers[NextIndex].SourceCommandQueue.Num() == 0 [File:UnrealEngine_4.22/Engine/Source/Runtime/AudioMixer/Private/AudioMixerSourceManager.cpp] [Line: 300] </denchmark-code>
Full log: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/files/3156762/CarlaUE4.log>CarlaUE4.log</denchmark-link>
As a workaround, launch Carla with the nosound flag <denchmark-code>./CarlaUE4.sh -nosound </denchmark-code>
